source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000010_EMETSELCH<tab>And lo, vile beasts did rise...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000010_EMETSELCH<tab>Comme autrefois, les bêtes ont été lâchées.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000020_EMETSELCH<tab>Leaving naught in their wake but blood and ash.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000020_EMETSELCH<tab>Les vivants sont passés à trépas. Leurs cités se sont embrasées.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000030_EMETSELCH<tab>Sun scorches earth and boils seas...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000030_EMETSELCH<tab>L'avenir n'est plus qu'une coquille calcinée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000040_EMETSELCH<tab>And our sins ascend unto the heavens─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000040_EMETSELCH<tab>Le désastre a frappé aussi vite que les ténèbres du couchant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000050_EMETSELCH<tab>Three dooms to unmake all we were.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000050_EMETSELCH<tab>Et le monde s'enfonce inexorablement dans l'abîme...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000060_ALISAIE<tab>The sky burns. The Final Days...are truly upon us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000060_ALISAIE<tab>Le ciel... Il brûle vraiment... L'apocalypse est bel et bien là...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000070_AWAHEEN<tab>...My friends. I trust you have heard the news.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000070_AWAHEEN<tab>Les Dieux soient loués<var 1D /var>! Vous avez eu notre message<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000080_ALPHINAUD<tab>We have. What can you tell us of the situation, Your Excellency?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oui, mais nous n'en savons guère plus. Pourriez-vous nous résumer la situation, Votre Excellence<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000090_AWAHEEN<tab>Last night, the isle was rocked by tremors, and the earth itself cried out.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000090_AWAHEEN<tab>La nuit dernière, un bruit déchirant a retenti d'un bout à l'autre de Thavnair. On n'aurait su dire s'il s'agissait d'un cri de douleur ou de la terre elle-même qui gémissait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000100_AWAHEEN<tab>Aloft, the heavens began to burn. From all about, unholy beasts─the likes of which we had never seen─came forth in fury and rage.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000100_AWAHEEN<tab>Le ciel s'est ensuite embrasé... Et pour ne rien arranger, des bêtes monstrueuses ont précédé et suivi le phénomène.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000110_AWAHEEN<tab>...No. To say they “came forth” would be...inexact.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000110_AWAHEEN<tab>Le plus terrible, c'est qu'elles ne sont pas sorties de nulle part...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000120_AWAHEEN<tab>The people of Radz-at-Han themselves transformed into these baleful fiends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000120_AWAHEEN<tab>Il s'agit d'êtres humains... Chacune d'entre elles en était un...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000130_AWAHEEN<tab>Though the phenomenon was observed throughout our lands, the first creature─the largest and most dreadful of the lot─wrought havoc upon us here, in our fair city.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000130_AWAHEEN<tab>Partout sur l'île, des habitants ont subi cette horrible métamorphose, mais c'est à Radz-at-Han que la première et la plus puissante de toutes ces abo<var 16 /var>mi<var 16 /var>na<var 16 /var>tions a été signalée. Elle a déjà fait de nombreuses victimes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000140_AWAHEEN<tab>Though they bear superficial resemblance to divinities of legend, they are ungodly abominations. The people decry them as “blasphemies.”
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000140_AWAHEEN<tab>En apparence, elle ressemble aux divinités que nous vénérons. Nous l'avons donc baptisée “Hérésiarque”, afin que personne ne s'y trompe.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000150_AWAHEEN<tab>The large one's rampage has since taken it to the northern reaches of the island. I mean to dispatch our Radiant Host in an attempt to quell the threat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000150_AWAHEEN<tab>La créature se trouve en ce moment dans le nord de l'île. J'étais sur le point de me rendre là-bas avec des soldats de l'Ost rayonnant pour l'abattre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000160_ESTINIEN<tab>And what of Vrtra?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000160_ESTINIEN<tab>Vrtra n'est pas resté calfeutré dans son palais, j'imagine.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000170_AWAHEEN<tab>Vrtra, too, makes for the north of his own accord. And yet...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000170_AWAHEEN<tab>Il est parti devant... mais je ne suis pas plus serein pour autant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000180_AWAHEEN<tab>He knows the blasphemy and its minions were but yesterday his beloved people.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000180_AWAHEEN<tab>Vrtra sait que derrière chacune de ces bêtes se cache un de ses sujets.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000190_AWAHEEN<tab>I pray his boundless compassion and mercy does not deter him from taking unenviable but necessary action.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000190_AWAHEEN<tab>J'ai peur que cela ne pèse sur sa conscience, et qu'un moment de flottement en plein combat ne lui coûte la vie...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000200_ALPHINAUD<tab>...Understood. I ask that you allow us to aid you in quelling this threat.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Merci, nous savons maintenant de quoi il retourne. Nous aimerions vous épauler dans votre traque, avec votre permission, bien sûr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000210_AWAHEEN<tab>You would risk your lives to help us yet again? I have no words to express my gratitude.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000210_AWAHEEN<tab>Votre aplomb face au danger m'impressionne... Votre aide est la bienvenue, Héritiers de la Septième Aube, et je l'accepte humblement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000220_AWAHEEN<tab>Our regiments approach the north from several directions, with a number of units set to depart from the docks of Yedlihmad.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000220_AWAHEEN<tab>Laissez-moi vous exposer notre plan. L'Ost rayonnant s'est séparé en plusieurs groupes afin d'atteindre le nord de l'île par différents itinéraires. Le nôtre partira d'ici même en bateau.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000230_AWAHEEN<tab>They will make landfall in an area of dense jungle, where one can expect to encounter dangers even beyond the fell beasts we hunt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000230_AWAHEEN<tab>Nous accosterons à l'orée d'une immense forêt vierge. Je doute que nous rencontrions une grande résistance sur la grève, mais il en sera cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment tout autre au fur et à mesure que nous progresserons. L'Hérésiarque est accompagné de son cortège de bêtes monstrueuses.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000240_AWAHEEN<tab>I leave you to your preparation. You will find me at the docks when you are ready to depart.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000240_AWAHEEN<tab>Un rude combat s'annonce. Alors ne nous rejoignez que lorsque vous serez fin prêts. Notre navire mouille déjà dans le port.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000250_ALISAIE<tab>We're as prepared as we'll ever be. Let's go.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000250_ALISAIE<tab>On est toujours prêts, pas vrai<var 1D /var>? Alors, allons-y<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000260_FAKEGODBEAST<tab>Grrraaaoooooohhhhhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000260_FAKEGODBEAST<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000270_FAKEGODBEAST<tab>Aaaaaaaaaggghhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000270_FAKEGODBEAST<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000280_FAKEGODBEAST<tab>Rrrrrruuu...ined. I'm...rrruuuined...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000280_FAKEGODBEAST<tab>Ma... FiRmE... ElLe... CoUlErA... PaS...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000290_YSHTOLA<tab>As I feared...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000290_YSHTOLA<tab>Par les Douze... c'est bien ce que je pensais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000300_ALPHINAUD<tab>What is it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000300_ALPHINAUD<tab>Comment ça, Y'shtola<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000310_YSHTOLA<tab>The beast was there...and now it is no more, yes?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000310_YSHTOLA<tab>Je ne me trompe pas, l'Hérésiarque était bien là à l'instant, et il a disparu, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000320_THANCRED<tab>Indeed, we saw it plain. But...you didn't, did you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000320_THANCRED<tab>Oui, pourquoi<var 1D /var>? Tu ne l'as pas vu avec ta vision de l'éther<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000330_YSHTOLA<tab>I saw nothing. Not the blasphemy that perished here, nor the other men-turned-beasts. And because of this, I now see all too well...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000330_YSHTOLA<tab>Si... Mais lui comme les monstres qui l'ac<var 16 /var>com<var 16 /var>pa<var 16 /var>gnent ne sont que des vides béants à mes yeux... Des ombres mouvantes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000340_YSHTOLA<tab>There is no aether. Where the creatures should be, I saw naught but emptiness...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000340_YSHTOLA<tab>Ils ne sont pas faits d'éther comme nous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000350_ALPHINAUD<tab>Emptiness? But that would mean...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000350_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais... Comment est-ce possible<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000360_YSHTOLA<tab>Recall the words of the watcher. 'Twas a stagnancy of aether─a cessation of flow leading to decay and absence─that led the ancients to conclude their star was dying...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000360_YSHTOLA<tab>Souvenez-vous de ce que nous a dit le veilleur sélénien, que leur planète avait commencé à dépérir là où le flux céleste était le moins dense.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000370_YSHTOLA<tab>This is the same phenomenon. The instant these people are seized by the transformation, their aether begins to...rot and crumble away like dried mud...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000370_YSHTOLA<tab>C'est précisément ce qui arrive à ces pauvres gens. Dès qu'ils se métamorphosent, leur éther se flétrit et disparaît.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000380_YSHTOLA<tab>Until, from their corporeal forms to their very souls, naught remains...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000380_YSHTOLA<tab>Leur éther corporel, mais aussi celui de leur âme... Il n'en reste plus rien...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000390_ALISAIE<tab>But the beast spoke with its dying breath! Surely, at least a sliver of the man it was endured!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000390_ALISAIE<tab>Pourtant, on a entendu l'Hérésiarque marmonner quelque chose<var 1D /var>! On aurait dit qu'il se souvenait de qui il était<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000400_YSHTOLA<tab>...Mayhap so. But even if the process was incomplete, 'twas little more than a faint residue.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000400_YSHTOLA<tab>Des bribes de l'être humain qu'il fut, tout au plus... Elles auraient fini par disparaître de toute façon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000410_ALISAIE<tab>Gods be good... You're saying they cannot be saved?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000410_ALISAIE<tab>Tu... Tu es en train de nous dire qu'on ne peut plus rien pour eux... Qu'ils sont tous condamnés...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000420_YSHTOLA<tab>Not by any means known to me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000420_YSHTOLA<tab>Nous avons accompli de plus grands miracles, c'est vrai.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000430_YSHTOLA<tab>...Or by any means at all, like as not. For there is naught left to save.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000430_YSHTOLA<tab>Mais je crains que ce soit peine perdue cette fois... Il ne reste plus rien d'eux. Nous n'avons rien à soigner ou à revitaliser.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000440_GRAHATIA<tab>They return not even to the aetherial sea...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000440_GRAHATIA<tab>Et leur âme détruite, ils ne rrretournent même pas à la mer des étoiles...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000450_VRITRA<tab>The beasts rage on, their hunger insatiable...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000450_VRITRA<tab>Les bêtes luttent toujours avec autant de virulence...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000460_VRITRA<tab>Even deprived of their master, they perpetuate his legacy of hate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000460_VRITRA<tab>J'espérais pourtant que nous les ferions battre en retraite en éliminant leur meneur...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000470_VRITRA<tab>Once proud sons and daughters of Thavnair, all of them...and now I spill their blood!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000470_VRITRA<tab>Chacun d'eux, un enfant de Thavnair<var 1D /var>! Combien ont déjà succombé sous mes griffes<var 1D /var>!? Combien devrai-je encore en exécuter<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000480_AWAHEEN<tab>Vrtra! My friends! I am heartened to see you safe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000480_AWAHEEN<tab>Les Dieux soient loués<var 1D /var>! Vous êtes tous sains et saufs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000490_ESTINIEN<tab>You put your secret at risk.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000490_ESTINIEN<tab>Votre ami dragon est là aussi. Vous n'avez pas peur que votre secret s'évente<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000500_AWAHEEN<tab>Those closest to me already know the truth─a truth I must now share with one and all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000500_AWAHEEN<tab>Ces soldats le savent déjà, ils sont dignes de confiance. Qui plus est... le temps est venu de tomber les masques.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000510_AWAHEEN<tab>...Vrtra. Calamity has come to Radz-at-Han. Our fair nation is rent by screams of pain and despair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000510_AWAHEEN<tab>Vrtra. Votre île vit son heure la plus sombre. Cris et pleurs ont envahi les rues de votre cité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000520_AWAHEEN<tab>More than ever, we require a strong leader to shepherd us through the storm. Reveal your true self to our people, Vrtra, and guide us to salvation!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000520_AWAHEEN<tab>Plus que jamais, nous avons besoin d'un satrape fort pour nous délivrer de ce cauchemar. Vous devez désormais prendre votre place en tant que meneur légitime de Radz-at-Han. Je vous en conjure, dévoilez-vous sous votre véritable jour à votre peuple, et soyez son guide<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000530_VRITRA<tab>What madness is this, Ahewann? Thou dost forget thyself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000530_VRITRA<tab>Tu as perdu la raison, Ahewann...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000540_VRITRA<tab>Were we to reveal our duplicity, it would do naught but foster confusion and chaos.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000540_VRITRA<tab>Nos sujets sont déjà en train de se noyer dans cette tempête de chaos. Me révéler à eux ne ferait que semer encore plus de confusion.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000550_VRITRA<tab>Nay, I shall remain the satrap's loyal ally, and do battle with the beasts. Easing hearts and leading the people to safety is thy task, and thine alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000550_VRITRA<tab>Je resterai le dragon bien<var 16 /var>veil<var 16 /var>lant, féal de ta lignée. Je pourfendrai ces bêtes qui nous veulent du mal, tandis que toi, tu rassureras le peuple. Telle est ta charge.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000560_VRITRA<tab>I ask that you remain at Ahewann's side, and render unto him what aid you may.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000560_VRITRA<tab>Quant à vous, Héritiers de la Septième Aube, je souhaiterais que vous aidiez Ahewann dans sa mission.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000570_VRITRA<tab>I know not what lies ahead, but without you, Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han will not survive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000570_VRITRA<tab>Ces événements nous dépassent, et sans votre aide, nous n'en percerons pas le mystère.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000580_ESTINIEN<tab>...Take me with you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000580_ESTINIEN<tab>Hé, Vrtra.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000590_ESTINIEN<tab>I am as at home fighting in the air as I am on land. Take me with you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000590_ESTINIEN<tab>Emmène-moi sur ton dos. Les combats de haute voltige, ça me connaît un peu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000600_VRITRA<tab>Were my words unclear? I require no assistance. Thy place is at Ahewann's side.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000600_VRITRA<tab>Tu ne m'as pas écouté, chevalier dragon. J'irai seul. Restez ensemble, et soutenez Ahewann de votre mieux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000610_THANCRED<tab>Estinien─here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000610_THANCRED<tab>Estinien, attrape.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000620_THANCRED<tab>It's the last thing you ever wanted─a linkpearl.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000620_THANCRED<tab>C'est une linkperle. Tu sais<var 1D /var>? Ce que tu t'es toujours obstiné à refuser.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000630_THANCRED<tab>We'd gain much from knowing your elevated perspective. And it'll keep you from getting lonely─which I know you loathe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000630_THANCRED<tab>Tu en auras besoin pour nous contacter si tu pars avec Vrtra. Et accessoirement, ça nous évitera d'avoir à te courir après.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000640_ESTINIEN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000640_ESTINIEN<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000650_ESTINIEN<tab>You heard the man. Seems I'm coming with you after all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000650_ESTINIEN<tab>Tu vois<var 1D /var>? La décision ne nous appartient pas... Mieux vaut te faire une raison, je viens avec toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000660_VRITRA<tab>Then I pray thy grip is iron. Be it on thy head if thou dost chance to fall.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000660_VRITRA<tab><var 1D /var>... Je ne te ménagerai pas. Je ne réponds de rien si tu tombes et te brises les os.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000670_ESTINIEN<tab>Fair enough. Now─shall we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000670_ESTINIEN<tab>T'en fais pas pour moi, les chevaliers dragons ont l'habitude des atterrissages violents. Allons-y, maintenant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000680_AWAHEEN<tab>I fear it is as Vrtra says: we will not survive this on our own. While I am loath to impose upon you again...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000680_AWAHEEN<tab>Vrtra a bien raison, je dois l'admettre. Nous ne pourrons élucider ce phénomène sans vous. Pourriez-vous nous prêter main-forte<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000690_ALPHINAUD<tab>I would insist if you did not. 'Tis the very reason we have come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000690_ALPHINAUD<tab>Bien sûr. Si nous sommes venus, c'est justement pour offrir notre assistance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000700_AWAHEEN<tab>Then once more I find myself without words to thank you properly. Let us return to the capital and plan our next course of action.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000700_AWAHEEN<tab>Thavnair vous en sera pour toujours redevable. Rentrons d'abord à Radz-at-Han, si vous le voulez bien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000710_YSHTOLA<tab>There you are. You've spoken with the survivors?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000710_YSHTOLA<tab>Ah, vous voilà. Avez-vous fait des découvertes in<var 16 /var>té<var 16 /var>res<var 16 /var>santes<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000720_GRAHATIA<tab>Indeed. We thought to share what we have gleaned, that we might together gain a greater understanding of present circumstances.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000720_GRAHATIA<tab>Oui, il faut qu'on parrrle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000730_ALPHINAUD<tab>Fortuitous timing. Alisaie and I completed our own investigations not long ago.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000730_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nous avons aussi des révélations à vous faire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000740_YSHTOLA<tab>Then we should take a moment to compare notes. Shall we begin with the two of you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000740_YSHTOLA<tab>Parfait, commençons par vous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000750_ALPHINAUD<tab>...So the merchant Khalzahl was gravely concerned about his business in the days preceding his untimely end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000750_ALPHINAUD<tab>Donc ce Khalzahl est devenu l'Hérésiarque après de longues semaines à se tourmenter pour l'avenir de ses affaires...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000760_ALISAIE<tab>The tales we heard were much the same. The first victims to be changed into blasphemies were all overcome with anguish of one manner or another.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000760_ALISAIE<tab>De ce qu'on a compris de notre côté, les Thavnairois qui se sont transformés étaient déjà tous en proie à une grande détresse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000770_ALISAIE<tab>Then those who saw their loved ones stolen before their eyes succumbed to a similar panic, setting in motion a chain of transformations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000770_ALISAIE<tab>Leurs proches et ceux qu'ils ont pris pour cible ont paniqué. Ça a créé une réaction en chaîne, et ils se sont métamorphosés à leur tour.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000780_ALPHINAUD<tab>Fear, unease, despair...these negative feelings serve as a catalyst.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000780_ALPHINAUD<tab>Pour résumer, tous éprouvaient un sentiment d'angoisse, de tristesse ou de désespoir. Je pense que nous tenons une piste sérieuse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000790_YSHTOLA<tab>If so, then it is not unlike the calamity that befell the ancients.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000790_YSHTOLA<tab>Tu as sûrement raison. D'autant plus qu'on peut y voir un point commun avec l'apocalypse amaurotaine.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000800_YSHTOLA<tab>With their creation magicks they unwittingly gave form to untold horrors.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000800_YSHTOLA<tab>Emet-Selch nous l'avait décrite, vous vous souvenez<var 1D /var>? Les Anciens avaient perdu le contrôle de leur magie créatrice, et ils s'étaient mis à matérialiser leurs plus grandes peurs sans même le vouloir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000810_YSHTOLA<tab>Had they simply lost control, surely it would have manifested in many forms─not all of them monstrous.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000810_YSHTOLA<tab>Mais pourquoi ont-ils été influencés uniquement par ces émotions<var 1D /var>? Quand un sort pareil s'emballe, il ne devrait pas faire de distinction.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000820_YSHTOLA<tab>Yet somehow this phenomenon is triggered solely by the darkness in their hearts. A common thread with what we now witness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000820_YSHTOLA<tab>Et si ce n'était pas un problème avec leur magie qui avait causé l'apocalypse, mais avec les sentiments qu'ils éprouvaient<var 1D /var>? Ça rejoindrait nos constatations ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000830_ALPHINAUD<tab>...Common, but not identical. While the beasts the ancients faced were forged with magic alone, those of today are born of sentient beings.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000830_ALPHINAUD<tab>Avec une différence notable, cependant. Les Anciens ont créé ces bêtes qui ont détruit leur civilisation, tandis que dans notre cas, ce sont les gens eux-mêmes qui se transforment.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000840_ALPHINAUD<tab>Why remains to be seen, but there is one fundamental difference between us and our predecessors: our souls are sundered, whereas theirs were not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000840_ALPHINAUD<tab>La raison m'échappe, mais elle réside peut-être dans la fragmentation de notre essence depuis la création des reflets<var 1D /var>? C'est ce qui nous sépare le plus d'eux, après tout.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000850_ALPHINAUD<tab>Perhaps that single variable makes all the difference.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000850_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ça ex<var 16 /var>pli<var 16 /var>que<var 16 /var>rait pourquoi l'apocalypse ne nous affecte pas de la même façon...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000860_GRAHATIA<tab>If I may...there was another detail that troubled me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000860_GRAHATIA<tab>Il y autre chose. Nous avons rrrecueilli un curieux témoignage.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000870_GRAHATIA<tab>We have it on good authority that Khalzahl's transformation took place before the skies began to burn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000870_GRAHATIA<tab>Il semblerait que Khalzahl se soit transformé <var 1A 02 /var>avant<var 1A 01 /var> que le ciel ne s'embrrrase.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000880_ALISAIE<tab>What!? If that's true, then the situation's more dire than we realized.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000880_ALISAIE<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>? Mais c'est pas bon du tout, ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000890_ALISAIE<tab>It means even if there's no ominous sign presaging the Final Days, anyone─anywhere─has the potential to become a beast.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000890_ALISAIE<tab>Si je comprends bien, ça signifie que ces monstres peuvent apparaître n'importe où, même là où l'apocalypse n'a pas encore frappé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000900_ALISAIE<tab>Even in lands we thought safe. Even as we speak...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000900_ALISAIE<tab>Il pourrait déjà y en avoir un peu partout sans qu'on soit au courant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000910_HANNISHMANA<tab>Look, it's the satrap!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000910_HANNISHMANA<tab>Regardez<var 1D /var>! C'est le satrape<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000920_HANNISHBOYA<tab>The satrap!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000920_HANNISHBOYA<tab>Votre Excellence<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000930_HANNISHWOMANA<tab>Thank the heavens...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000930_HANNISHWOMANA<tab>Nous sommes sauvés...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000940_AWAHEEN<tab>My countrymen. I am relieved and heartened to see you strong and safe.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000940_AWAHEEN<tab>Mes amis<var 1D /var>! Je suis heureux de vous voir sains et saufs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000950_AWAHEEN<tab>While the danger has not yet passed─far from it─allow me to assure you that the beasts that raged within the city walls have been exterminated to the last.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000950_AWAHEEN<tab>Il est encore trop tôt pour relâcher notre vigilance, mais permettez-moi de vous rassurer. Nous avons éliminé les bêtes qui ont assailli notre fière cité. Plus aucune menace ne devrait peser sur vous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000960_AWAHEEN<tab>Outside this sanctuary, the brave men and women of the Radiant Host and our dragon ally continue to battle our unholy foes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000960_AWAHEEN<tab>Quant aux villages alentour, l'Ost rayonnant et le dragon féal volent à leur secours au moment même où je vous parle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000970_AWAHEEN<tab>I pray these tidings put your minds at ease, and help you calm your hearts. Have faith that we shall soon conquer this terrible trial.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000970_AWAHEEN<tab>Je vous en conjure donc. Ne laissez pas la panique s'emparer de vos cœurs. Il n'y a plus rien à craindre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000980_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>Your Excellency...is there any word from Palaka's Stand?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000980_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>Votre Excellence<var 1D /var>! Savez-vous ce qu'il est advenu de l'Écoute des Palaka<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000990_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>My grandson was bound for there yesterday, and I-I worry for his life...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_000990_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>Ma petite-fille, elle... elle devait se rendre au village hier. Mais je n'ai aucune nouvelle d'elle depuis...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001000_AWAHEEN<tab>We are still awaiting a report. But I promise you, as soon as I have aught to share...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001000_AWAHEEN<tab>Mes soldats me feront bientôt parvenir leurs rapports. Soyez sûre que je partagerai ces in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions avec vous dès que possible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001010_MATSYA<tab>(-???-)Y-Your Excellency! I bring grave news!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001010_MATSYA<tab>(-???-)Où est le satrape<var 1D /var>!? Votre Excellence<var 1D /var>! Votre Excellence<var 1D /var>! C'est terrible<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001020_AWAHEEN<tab>You are...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001020_AWAHEEN<tab>Qui es-tu, jeune homme<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001030_MATSYA<tab>I...I'm Matsya of Akyaali. A humble fisherman.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001030_MATSYA<tab>Moi... moi, c'est Matsya. Je suis un humble pêcheur du village d'Akyaali.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001040_THANCRED<tab>Ah, I remember you from our first visit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001040_THANCRED<tab>Je me souviens de toi. On s'est rencontrés à notre arrivée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001050_MATSYA<tab>Hm? Wait, you're...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001050_MATSYA<tab>Tiens, qu'est-ce que vous faites encore là<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001060_MATSYA<tab>B-But no, that can wait!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001060_MATSYA<tab>On pourra parler plus tard. Votre Excellence<var 1D /var>! J'ai de terribles nouvelles<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001070_MATSYA<tab>When the skies turned red, I set off for Palaka's Stand, fearing for the safety of a friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001070_MATSYA<tab>Quand le ciel s'est détraqué, j'ai foncé vers l'Écoute des Palaka, parce que j'ai un ami qui habite là-bas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001080_MATSYA<tab>But as I drew near the village, I saw dreadful beasts all about.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001080_MATSYA<tab>Mais avant d'arriver au village, eh ben... je suis tombé sur d'horribles créatures<var 1D /var>! J'en avais encore jamais vu des comme ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001090_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>No... Gods have mercy...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001090_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>Oh non... Par tous les Dieux, non...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001100_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>Your Excellency! Save my grandson! I beg of you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001100_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>Je vous en supplie, Votre Excellence<var 1D /var>! Envoyez-leur des secours<var 1D /var>! Sauvez ma petite-fille<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001110_AWAHEEN<tab>We will spare no effort to save all we can. But you must remain calm─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001110_AWAHEEN<tab>Vous avez ma parole, Madame. Rassurez-vous, tout ira bien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001120_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>Calm!? You tell me to be calm!? You saw those beasts! They tore our bravest warriors limb from limb!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001120_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>Mais vous n'en savez rien<var 1D /var>! Je les ai vues ces bêtes ignobles<var 1D /var>! Je les ai vues déchiqueter nos soldats comme du vulgaire papier<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001130_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>What if we are too late? If they catch him─sink their fangs into him...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001130_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>Ma petite n'a aucune chance si elle se fait attaquer par ces monstres...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001140_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>The fangs...the blood...the screams!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001140_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>Elle va... Elle va...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001150_YSHTOLA<tab>Get away from her. Now!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001150_YSHTOLA<tab>C'est mauvais signe... Reculez tous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001160_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>Aaagggh! Aaaaaaaaaggghhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001160_HANNISHOLDWOMANA<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001170_HANNISHWOMANA<tab>Nooo! Nooooooooo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001170_HANNISHWOMANA<tab>Aaah<var 1D /var>! Aaaaah<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001180_THANCRED<tab>...Damn it. We've got to kill them before it spreads!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001180_THANCRED<tab>Pas encore... Je m'occupe de les distraire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001190_YSHTOLA<tab>We'll handle this. See the townspeople to safety!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001190_YSHTOLA<tab>Je vais l'aider<var 1D /var>! Occupez-vous d'évacuer les autres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001200_HANNISHMANA<tab>Run! As fast as you can!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001200_HANNISHMANA<tab>Suis-moi, fiston<var 1D /var>! Faut pas rester ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001210_HANNISHBOYA<tab>Ah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001210_HANNISHBOYA<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001220_HANNISHBOYA<tab>Aaah...aaah...no!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001220_HANNISHBOYA<tab>Ah... Ah, aaah...<var 1D /var>! Aaah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001230_HANNISHBOYA<tab>Gaaaaaaghhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001230_HANNISHBOYA<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001240_HANNISHBOYA<tab>Faaa...grrraaaaaaghhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001240_HANNISHBOYA<tab>Paaaaa... Paaaaa...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001242_AWAHEEN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001242_AWAHEEN<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001244_AWAHEEN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001244_AWAHEEN<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001246_AWAHEEN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001246_AWAHEEN<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001250_AWAHEEN<tab>Vrtra... Our people... You must save them!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001250_AWAHEEN<tab>Aidez Vrtra à prendre la place qui lui revient<var 1D /var>! Sauvez Radz-at-Han<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001260_HANNISHMANA<tab>My son...he...he... The satrap!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001260_HANNISHMANA<tab>M-mon... mon fils...<var 1D /var>! Le satrape<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001270_GRAHATIA<tab>Enough! You must run, for their sake and your own!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001270_GRAHATIA<tab>Rrreprenez-vous<var 1D /var>! Vous ne pourrez pas les pleurer si vous mourez aussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001275_HANNISHMANA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001275_HANNISHMANA<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001280_GRAHATIA<tab>Yes. You will survive. You must.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001280_GRAHATIA<tab>Voilà, comme ça. On rrrespire doucement...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001290_GRAHATIA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001290_GRAHATIA<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001300_GRAHATIA<tab>Be strong, my friends!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001300_GRAHATIA<tab>Habitants de Radz-at-Han<var 1D /var>! Ne perdez pas espoir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001310_GRAHATIA<tab>Fear not, for we will defeat these abominations!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001310_GRAHATIA<tab>Faites-nous confiance<var 1D /var>! Nous vous protégerons de ces bêtes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001320_GRAHATIA<tab>Brave men and women of the Radiant Host! Lend Y'shtola and Thancred your aid! Let not a single beast escape!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001320_GRAHATIA<tab>Soldats de l'Ost rayonnant<var 1D /var>! Assistez Y'shtola et Thancred<var 1D /var>! Sécurisez cette place<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001330_GRAHATIA<tab>The rest of you, flee this place! Carry the wounded if you must! Head indoors, or underground!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001330_GRAHATIA<tab>Que tous les autres aident les blessés<var 1D /var>! Tâchez de vous réfugier ensemble dans les bâtiments les plus proches, ou en contrebas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001340_GRAHATIA<tab>Above all, stay calm. No beasts will follow you─we will see to that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001340_GRAHATIA<tab>Gardez votre sang-froid. Je vous promets que nous ne laisserons aucun de ces monstres vous faire plus de mal<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001350_THANCRED<tab>Alphinaud! Alisaie! Leave the city to us, and make for Palaka's Stand at once!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001350_THANCRED<tab>Alphinaud, Alisaie<var 1D /var>! On a la situation en main, ici<var 1D /var>! Foncez à l'Écoute des Palaka<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001360_THANCRED<tab>Matsya, show my friends to the village. I promise you─they're more capable than the Host's finest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001360_THANCRED<tab>Matsya<var 1D /var>! Je compte sur toi pour les guider jusque là-bas<var 1D /var>! Ils sauront se montrer utiles, crois-moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001370_MATSYA<tab>R-Right!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001370_MATSYA<tab>D'a-d'accord<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001380_GRAHATIA<tab>Go with them, will you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001380_GRAHATIA<tab>Ils auront besoin de toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001390_GRAHATIA<tab>We will save these people─as many as we can!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001390_GRAHATIA<tab>Moi, je reste ici. Nous sauverons autant de personnes que possible<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001400_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in the skies above Thavnair─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001400_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Pendant ce temps, dans le ciel de Thavnair

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001410_ESTINIEN<tab>No more enemies to trouble us here...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001410_ESTINIEN<tab>Nous voilà débarrassés de la plupart des bêtes volantes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001420_ESTINIEN<tab>...It's me. How fare you below?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001420_ESTINIEN<tab>Alors, comment ça se passe de votre côté<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001430_ESTINIEN<tab>...Understood. I will inform Vrtra.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001430_ESTINIEN<tab>Entendu... Oui, je lui en ferai part. À plus tard.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001440_ESTINIEN<tab>Chaos and panic sweep Radz-at-Han, and many more have succumbed to the transformations.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001440_ESTINIEN<tab>Un autre incident a eu lieu à Radz-at-Han. Des métamorphoses, comme la dernière fois.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001450_ESTINIEN<tab>Amidst the fray, Ahewann fell...protecting a grief-stricken father.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001450_ESTINIEN<tab>Ahewann s'est interposé pour sauver un habitant. Il y a laissé la vie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001460_VRITRA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001460_VRITRA<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001470_ESTINIEN<tab>My friends fight alongside your Radiant Host to secure the capital.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001470_ESTINIEN<tab>Mes compagnons et tes soldats travaillent main dans la main pour reprendre le contrôle de la situation.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001480_ESTINIEN<tab>Beasts have been sighted in Palaka's Stand as well. We have divided our forces in hopes of quelling the threat there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001480_ESTINIEN<tab>Certains d'entre eux ont quitté la cité pour porter secours à l'Écoute des Palaka. Les bêtes assaillent le village en ce moment même.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001490_ESTINIEN<tab>Of small solace is that we now know what triggers the transformation. As my companions tell it...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001490_ESTINIEN<tab>Mais il y a aussi du bon. Nous en savons plus sur l'origine de ces monstres.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001500_VRITRA<tab>So it is the very fear and despair in their hearts which inflict this abhorrent punishment upon them...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001500_VRITRA<tab>La peur et le désespoir seraient res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bles<var 1D /var>? Nous nageons en plein cauchemar...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001510_VRITRA<tab>...A nightmare from which my children will never awake. O capricious and cruel fate─they are undeserving of such condemnation...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001510_VRITRA<tab>Radz-at-Han, Thavnair... Mon peuple n'a rien fait pour mériter pareille torture<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001520_ESTINIEN<tab>Will you wallow in sorrow or rise to the occasion?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001520_ESTINIEN<tab>Tu cries à l'injustice... Mais il ne tient qu'à toi d'intervenir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001530_ESTINIEN<tab>Radz-at-Han is leaderless. Before he passed, Ahewann sought to reveal the truth to his people. Honor his wishes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001530_ESTINIEN<tab>Radz-at-Han a besoin de son satrape, de son protecteur. Le moment est venu de choisir si tu es prêt à assumer ce rôle, comme Ahewann le voulait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001540_VRITRA<tab>To what end? To breed a new conflict between dragon and man?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001540_VRITRA<tab>Qu'en découlerait-il si j'acceptais<var 1D /var>? Humains et dragons ne sont pas faits pour vivre ensemble.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001550_VRITRA<tab>These claws could reduce thee to shreds with a touch. These jaws, crush thy bones to dust.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001550_VRITRA<tab>Mes plus douces caresses pourraient vous déchiqueter, et un simple coup de ma mâchoire vous broyer tous les os du corps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001560_VRITRA<tab>Only through my proxy could I walk with my children. Without him, I am a bringer of fear─no different from the beasts which beleaguer them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001560_VRITRA<tab>Si j'ai pu m'immiscer dans les affaires des humains au cours des âges, c'est seulement car je l'ai fait à travers un alter ego à votre image. Sous ma véritable apparence, je n'aurais fait qu'inspirer la peur et semer le trouble, comme ces bêtes qui nous assaillent aujourd'hui.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001570_ESTINIEN<tab>Perhaps so...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001570_ESTINIEN<tab>Je ne peux pas te contredire...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001580_ESTINIEN<tab>Only in death were Hraesvelgr and Shiva united. Indeed, whenever man and dragon have come together, death has ever been the inevitable result.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001580_ESTINIEN<tab>Humains et dragons sont bien différents, tu dis vrai. Même Shiva n'a vraiment été unie à son amant Hraesvelgr que dans la mort.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001590_ESTINIEN<tab>'Twas our fear of your kind that sparked a nigh-endless war.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001590_ESTINIEN<tab>Et motivés par la peur, les humains ont plus tard commis l'irréparable et provoqué la Guerre du chant des dragons.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001600_ESTINIEN<tab>Fear and hate of which Nidhogg drank deep as he laid waste to my homeland.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001600_ESTINIEN<tab>Un conflit au cours duquel ma terre natale a été dévastée par la rage de Nidhogg...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001610_ESTINIEN<tab>And in turn I took my revenge on his brood. Blood for blood; pain for pain. I thought nothing of theirs─only of mine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001610_ESTINIEN<tab>J'ai alors hérité de ce cycle infernal de vengeance, et j'ai abattu nombre de tes semblables. Nous avons beaucoup d'états d'âme à prendre la vie d'autres humains, mais nous n'y réfléchissons pas à deux fois lorsqu'il s'agit de celle d'un dragon.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001620_ESTINIEN<tab>And yet...were the chasm between us too vast and too deep, Hraesvelgr would not have borne Ysayle to battle and our rescue.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001620_ESTINIEN<tab>Et pourtant... Hraesvelgr a pris Cœur-de-glace sur son dos.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001630_ESTINIEN<tab>He would have never entrusted a mortal champion with one of his eyes, and the Dragonsong War would still rage on.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001630_ESTINIEN<tab>Et pourtant, <var 08 E905 ((une humaine)) ((un humain)) /var> héroïque s'est servi de l'Œil du dragon pour mettre fin à la guerre entre nos deux espèces.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001640_ESTINIEN<tab>And I would still wage a never-ending war of violence and vengeance, the future of our star be damned.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001640_ESTINIEN<tab>Même cette lance, baignée du sang de mes anciens ennemis, m'aide aujourd'hui à défendre notre monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001650_ESTINIEN<tab>I cannot speak for Ahewann's greater goals. Yet I know that he served you─served your people─long and true.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001650_ESTINIEN<tab>J'ai à peine connu Ahewann, mais il me semble avoir œuvré toute sa vie pour remplir le rôle d'intermédiaire entre toi et le peuple de Thavnair.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001660_ESTINIEN<tab>In this time of unprecedented crisis, he turned to you. You could do worse than to place your trust in him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001660_ESTINIEN<tab>Ce loyal serviteur t'a recommandé de te révéler au grand jour, et tu lui avais bien accordé ta confiance, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001670_ESTINIEN<tab>It will not be easy, but the future of Radz-at-Han hangs in the balance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001670_ESTINIEN<tab>C'est seulement en travaillant main dans la main que les Thavnairois et toi pourrez affronter l'avenir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001680_ESTINIEN<tab>We have company!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001680_ESTINIEN<tab>Rah, en voilà d'autres...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001690_VRITRA<tab>I am ready.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001690_VRITRA<tab>Je suis prêt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001700_ESTINIEN<tab>The hour is come, Vrtra. It's all or nothing!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001700_ESTINIEN<tab>C'est ici que tout se joue, Vrtra... On les réduit en poussière<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001710_ALPHINAUD<tab>Courage, friend. The pain will pass.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001710_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ne vous en faites pas, la douleur va bientôt s'estomper.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001720_MATSYA<tab>Has anyone seen Mehvan?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001720_MATSYA<tab>Quelqu'un aurait vu Mehvan<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001730_MATSYA<tab>Where could she be...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001730_MATSYA<tab>Où est-ce qu'elle peut bien être...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001740_ALISAIE<tab>We've dealt with all the blasphemies...and made certain no villagers are still in hiding.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001740_ALISAIE<tab>On vient de faire le tour des environs. On n'a croisé ni bêtes ni humains.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001750_ALPHINAUD<tab>Good work. We've otherwise tended to the wounded as best we can.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001750_ALPHINAUD<tab>Merci d'avoir cherché. J'ai prodigué tous les soins que je pouvais de mon côté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001760_PALAKASMAN<tab>What will become of us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001760_PALAKASMAN<tab>Qu'est-ce qu'on va devenir...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001770_PALAKASWOMANA<tab>Help is on the way, surely. We may have to abandon our homes now, but we will return. Someday.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001770_PALAKASWOMANA<tab>T'en fais pas, de l'aide va arriver du continent. On pourra peut-être pas rentrer chez nous avant un moment, mais ça viendra.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001780_PALAKASMAN<tab>But where can we go? Is anywhere even safe?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001780_PALAKASMAN<tab>Tu crois...<var 1D /var>? Le reste du monde va bien à ton avis<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001790_PALAKASWOMANA<tab>That, I cannot say...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001790_PALAKASWOMANA<tab>Ça... je saurais pas te dire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001800_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>Well, I can. Nowhere's safe! Run all you like, but there's no escaping these things!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001800_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>Vous rigolez<var 1D /var>!? Rien ne sera plus jamais comme avant<var 1D /var>! On aura beau fuir, ça ne changera rien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001810_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>And even if I could...it's too late for my family!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001810_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>J'ai... J'ai tout perdu... Toute ma famille... Ils sont...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001820_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001820_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001830_ALISAIE<tab>This isn't good. The more they dwell on the tragedy, the more likely we are to lose them, too...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001830_ALISAIE<tab>Ça va recommencer... Faut pas les laisser broyer du noir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001840_MATSYA<tab>My friends! This...this is a place of worship!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001840_MATSYA<tab>É-écoutez-moi<var 1D /var>! Vous savez où on est, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? Au temple du Purusa<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001850_MATSYA<tab>Should your heart quake with sadness, cast your mind to the heavens and remember.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001850_MATSYA<tab>Alors... Communiez avec les Dieux, les vrais<var 1D /var>! Rappelez-vous leurs paroles pour surmonter ce moment difficile<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001860_MATSYA<tab>Remember the teachings of the old gods. Did they not implore us to stand fast when waves of sorrow break against our shores?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001860_MATSYA<tab>Nous avons déjà fait face à d'autres tragédies. Et leur premier en<var 16 /var>sei<var 16 /var>gne<var 16 /var>ment nous a toujours permis d'endurer la peine<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001870_PALAKASWOMANA<tab>Know this, my children. There is more ugliness than beauty in this world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001870_PALAKASWOMANA<tab>Enfant né de l'Homme, entends-nous... Sache que la toile d'une vie n'est pas tissée que de bonheur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001880_PALAKASWOMANA<tab>To live is to suffer. To drink of calamity and drown in anguish. To toil and be tested, always and ever.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001880_PALAKASWOMANA<tab>Vous, mortels, connaissez la peine, la douleur, le désespoir. Vous endurez les épreuves tout au long de votre existence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001890_PALAKASOLDMAN<tab>'Tis a perilous path you walk. Death lurks in the dark, and is the sole promise that awaits at journey's end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001890_PALAKASOLDMAN<tab>Ton chemin sera peut-être jonché de braises, et sans aucune récompense à l'arrivée. Et devrais-tu t'en écarter, seule la mort viendra t'enlacer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001900_PALAKASOLDMAN<tab>You will tremble with terror. You will weep tears of anger and despair...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001900_PALAKASOLDMAN<tab>Peur, tourment, souffrance... Tel sera ton fardeau.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001910_PALAKASMAN<tab>...But do not avert your eyes. See your life for what it is.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001910_PALAKASMAN<tab>Malgré cela, garde toujours les yeux braqués sur l'avenir.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001920_PALAKASMAN<tab>Then will you see how the hardships make you strong.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001920_PALAKASMAN<tab>Car toutes ces difficultés ne t'affaibliront pas, bien au contraire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001930_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>Every doubt reforged as scales for your armor.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001930_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>Tu es l'acier incandescent sur lequel martèle in<var 16 /var>las<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment l'aléa.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001940_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>Every agony to temper your blade...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001940_PALAKASWOMANB<tab>Tu es la lame invincible... forgée par la vie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001950_PALAKASOLDMAN<tab>Thank you, lad. We'd almost forgotten who we are.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001950_PALAKASOLDMAN<tab>Merci de nous avoir rappelé les saintes paroles. Elles nous sont plus que jamais d'un grand secours.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001960_PALAKASOLDMAN<tab>My undying gratitude to you as well, my friends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001960_PALAKASOLDMAN<tab>Je vous sais gré aussi à vous tous. Vous nous avez sauvés d'une terrible fin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001970_PALAKASOLDMAN<tab>You were searching for Mehvan, no? We must return home. I pray you help the boy find his friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001970_PALAKASOLDMAN<tab>Ne vous en faites pas, nous pourrons rentrer seuls jusqu'au village. Mais Mehvan manque encore à l'appel... Si vous pouviez la retrouver, je vous en prie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Gladly. We dispatched what beasts we could, but the roads are still dangerous. Stay together, and go in safety.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Comptez sur nous. La voie devrait être sans danger, maintenant, mais soyez quand même prudents et restez groupés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001990_ALISAIE<tab>That was very impressive, what you did back there. Those words seemed to resonate with your people.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_001990_ALISAIE<tab>Sacré discours, Matsya. Ça fait partie de vos en<var 16 /var>sei<var 16 /var>gne<var 16 /var>ments religieux, c'est ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002000_MATSYA<tab>They should. They were the first spoken unto our ancestors by the divinity of legend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002000_MATSYA<tab>Oui, il s'agit du tout premier précepte que les Dieux nous ont transmis, dans leur grande sagesse.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002010_MATSYA<tab>I'm easily upset, and fish are wont to flee a temperamental hand. So I recite the teachings, over and over, to calm myself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002010_MATSYA<tab>J'ai... J'ai souvent tendance à douter de moi, quand je me fais sermonner ou quand ça va mal, comme après une mauvaise pêche. Alors je me répète toujours ce passage.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002020_ALISAIE<tab>They're lovely and inspiring to hear. Though I imagine they were born of great misfortune.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002020_ALISAIE<tab>Ces vérités sont difficiles à avaler, mais elles ont le mérite de motiver. Même moi, j'ai retrouvé de l'entrain.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002030_MATSYA<tab>They are born of life. There's as much bad as good in it─more, many would attest. All the more reason to appreciate the good when you can.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002030_MATSYA<tab>C'est la vie. Si on sait dès le départ qu'elle va pas être facile, on peut s'y préparer, et comme ça, on est d'autant plus heureux lorsque le bonheur frappe à notre porte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002040_ALPHINAUD<tab>I won't argue with that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ma foi, ce n'est pas une mauvaise philosophie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002050_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)In darkness seek joy. Surrender not to sadness, and see beyond despair. Walk free, and bear the light for others to follow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002050_HYDAELYN<tab>(-Hydaelyn-)Plonge au plus profond des Ténèbres, et trouves-y ton bonheur propre. Regarde le désespoir en face, et fraye-toi un chemin à travers les larmes de la tristesse... Ce n'est qu'alors, en allant de l'avant sans jamais faillir, que tu révéleras son véritable éclat...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002060_ALISAIE<tab>And with that, let us see if we can't find Mehvan.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002060_ALISAIE<tab>Bon. On est plus motivés que jamais, alors remettons-nous à la recherche de Mehvan.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002070_ALISAIE<tab>Did you see!? That beast was chasing someone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002070_ALISAIE<tab>Vous avez vu ça<var 1D /var>? On aurait dit que quelqu'un était poursuivi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002080_MATSYA<tab>That's her... No, I'm...I'm sure of it! Mehvan!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002080_MATSYA<tab>Oh...<var 1D /var>! Je crois que c'est elle<var 1D /var>! C'est Mehvan<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002090_MEHVAN<tab>Don't, please!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002090_MEHVAN<tab>Ne t'approche pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002095_MEHVAN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002095_MEHVAN<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002100_ALISAIE<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002100_ALISAIE<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002110_MEHVAN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002110_MEHVAN<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002120_MATSYA<tab>No...gods have mercy!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002120_MATSYA<tab>Non<var 1D /var>! Pas ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002130_ALISAIE<tab>She's so cold, Alphinaud...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002130_ALISAIE<tab>Ça marche pas<var 1D /var>! Il reste froid comme la pierre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002140_ALPHINAUD<tab>The child is alert, and I see no wounds. And yet, she grows weaker...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002140_ALPHINAUD<tab>Il a repris con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce et je ne vois aucune blessure... En revanche, sa force vitale décline...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002150_ALPHINAUD<tab>My spells can do no more. What she needs is a change of clothes and a warm bed. We must hurry back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002150_ALPHINAUD<tab>La magie ne lui sera d'aucun secours, nous ferions mieux de le transporter jusqu'au village pour le sécher et le réchauffer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Not now...!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002160_ALPHINAUD<tab>Pas maintenant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002170_ALISAIE<tab>Matsya, take the child!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002170_ALISAIE<tab>Matsya. Prends-le avec toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Godsdammit, it appears we've made enough noise to be heard for malms around. More will be upon us ere long.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Le raffut a dû attirer toutes les bêtes qui étaient tapies dans les environs. D'autres ne vont sûrement pas tarder à se montrer...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002190_ALPHINAUD<tab>We make our stand here. Matsya, can you take her back to the village?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002190_ALPHINAUD<tab>On n'a pas le choix... Matsya, tu penses pouvoir retourner jusqu'au village avec la petite dans les bras<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002200_MATSYA<tab>Th-The child? All...all by myself!? You can't be serious!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002200_MATSYA<tab>Euh... Ou-oui, je crois que oui. Mais... tout seul, tu veux dire<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002210_ALISAIE<tab>The beasts will follow you home unless we stop them here─and so we shall.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002210_ALISAIE<tab>On n'a pas le choix. Ces bêtes nous poursuivront si on t'accompagne. On va rester ici pour couvrir votre fuite.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002220_ALISAIE<tab>Be strong, Matsya! Her life is in your hands!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002220_ALISAIE<tab>Tu vas devoir être courageux. La vie de cet enfant dépend de toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002230_MATSYA<tab>R-Right! I...I can do it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002230_MATSYA<tab>D'a-d'accord<var 1D /var>! Je-je vous attendrai là-bas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002240_ALISAIE<tab>I know you can! We'll keep them busy, Matsya. Go─quickly!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002240_ALISAIE<tab>On va attirer leur attention autant que possible. Vas-y, fonce, Matsya<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002250_MATSYA<tab><huff> <puff>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002250_MATSYA<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002260_MATSYA<tab>Steady... You know the way...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002260_MATSYA<tab>Je... Je dois garder mon calme... Je dois pas avoir peur...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002270_MATSYA<tab>No, no! Not you, too...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002270_MATSYA<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>!? Non, non, pas ça<var 1D /var>! S'il te plaît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002280_MATSYA<tab>Don't be afraid. Don't be afraid...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002280_MATSYA<tab>J'ai pas peur<var 1D /var>! J'ai pas peur<var 1D /var>! J'ai pas peur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002290_MATSYA<tab>To live is to suffer. To drink of calamity...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002290_MATSYA<tab>Vous, mortels, connaissez la peine, la douleur, le désespoir...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002300_MATSYA<tab>'Tis a perilous path... Death...lurks in the dark...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002300_MATSYA<tab>Écarte-toi du chemin, et seule la mort viendra t'enlacer...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002310_MATSYA<tab>Aie!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002310_MATSYA<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002320_MATSYA<tab>N-No! I'm not afraid! I'm not afraid!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002320_MATSYA<tab>Pourquoi<var 1D /var>!? Non<var 1D /var>! J'ai pas peur<var 1D /var>! J'ai pas peur, je le jure<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002330_MATSYA<tab>Uwaaaaaah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002330_MATSYA<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002340_MATSYA<tab>Do not avert your eyes. See...see your life for what it is...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002340_MATSYA<tab>Toutes ces difficultés ne t'affaibliront pas, bien au contraire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002350_MATSYA<tab>See how the hardships make you strong. Every doubt reforged...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002350_MATSYA<tab>Tu es l'acier incandescent... sur lequel martèle in<var 16 /var>las<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment l'aléa...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002360_MATSYA<tab>Every...agony...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002360_MATSYA<tab>Tu es la lame invincible... forgée par la vie...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002370_MATSYA<tab>Ah─!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002370_MATSYA<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002380_MATSYA<tab>Huh?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002380_MATSYA<tab>Hein...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002390_MATSYA<tab>The divinity...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002390_MATSYA<tab>Vous... Vous êtes des Dieux...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002400_VRITRA<tab>...Nay. But one who would deliver thee just the same.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002400_VRITRA<tab>Non... Mais nous vous protégerons comme ils le feraient.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002410_MATSYA<tab>Please... You must save the child!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002410_MATSYA<tab>Je vous en prie, aidez ce bébé<var 1D /var>! C'est le seul qui compte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002420_MATSYA<tab>She is all that remains of Mehvan and Qerasaf. Please!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002420_MATSYA<tab>C'est l'enfant de Qerasaf et de Mehvan, ce qu'ils avaient de plus cher<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002430_ESTINIEN<tab>Well, well. Seems the babe's taken a liking to you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002430_ESTINIEN<tab>La sagesse n'attend pas le nombre des années. Même lui sait à qui se fier.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002440_VRITRA<tab>Thou art strong, little one. Let us convey thee to thy home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002440_VRITRA<tab>Ta bravoure t'honore, jeune Arkasodara. Nous vous escorterons jusqu'à l'Écoute des Palaka.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002450_ESTINIEN<tab>Phew...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002450_ESTINIEN<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002460_ESTINIEN<tab>I spied our friends as we flew in...they appeared to be holding their own against the horde.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002460_ESTINIEN<tab>J'ai aperçu mes camarades livrer bataille un peu plus loin... Mais j'imagine qu'ils n'ont pas besoin de moi. De là-haut, ils avaient l'air de se débrouiller comme des chefs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002470_ALISAIE<tab>Right. That's the last of them. We should hurry and find Matsya...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002470_ALISAIE<tab>Et voilà le travail. On doit se dépêcher de rattraper Matsya, maintenant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I have a feeling he'll be fine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Mon petit doigt me dit que lui et l'enfant sont déjà en sécurité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>He had help. From on high.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>J'ai vu comme une étoile filante s'écraser vers là où il courait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002480_ALISAIE<tab>Really? How can you be so sure?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002480_ALISAIE<tab>Ah oui<var 1D /var>? Qu'est-ce qui te fait dire ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002490_ALISAIE<tab>What, like divine aid...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002490_ALISAIE<tab>Comment ça, une étoile filante<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002500_ESTINIEN<tab>A fine battle it must have been. Shame I missed it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002500_ESTINIEN<tab>Alors, on s'amuse sans moi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002510_ALPHINAUD<tab>Estinien! It was you who came to Matsya's aid?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002510_ALPHINAUD<tab>Estinien<var 1D /var>! Tu as porté secours à Matsya<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002520_ESTINIEN<tab>I was only along for the ride─Vrtra was the one who saw the boy was in need. The two are headed back to the village.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002520_ESTINIEN<tab>Tout le mérite revient à Vrtra. C'est lui qui a bien voulu faire un crochet. Là, ils sont en route pour le village.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Where the wyrm will honor Ahewann's wishes and finally reveal himself to his people...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Vrtra a donc choisi de sortir de l'ombre... Ça n'a pas dû être une décision facile à prendre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002540_ESTINIEN<tab>Perhaps so. Will you go and join them?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002540_ESTINIEN<tab>C'est sûr... Vous voulez qu'on les rejoigne tout de suite<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002550_ALISAIE<tab>There's something I need to do first.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002550_ALISAIE<tab>Non... Il nous reste une tâche à accomplir ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002560_ALISAIE<tab>Mehvan gave her life so that her child might live. She deserves better than to be left to drift alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002560_ALISAIE<tab>Mehvan a donné sa vie pour protéger sa fille. J'aimerais pouvoir lui dire qu'elle est saine et sauve.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002570_ALISAIE<tab>She deserves to be laid to rest beside her husband, at least. Will you help me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002570_ALISAIE<tab>Tu pourrais m'aider à retrouver son corps<var 1D /var>? Comme ça, elle reposera aux côtés de son mari.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002580_HANNISHMANB<tab>Look! Someone's coming!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002580_HANNISHMANB<tab>Regardez<var 1D /var>! Quelqu'un sort du palais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002590_VARSHAHN<tab>People of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han. It warms my heart to see so many brave, resilient souls before me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002590_VARSHAHN<tab>Merci de vous être tous réunis ici.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002600_VARSHAHN<tab>Today, I would share with you a great revelation. But before I do, I must make a humble request...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002600_VARSHAHN<tab>L'annonce que j'ai à vous faire est de la plus haute importance. Mais avant ça, j'aurais une requête.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002610_VARSHAHN<tab>Do not be alarmed, nor avert your eyes. See the one I unveil for who he is, and know that he means you no harm.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002610_VARSHAHN<tab>Une personne va se joindre à moi. Quelle que soit votre surprise, je vous prie de garder votre calme. Elle ne vous fera aucun mal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002620_HANNISHMANB<tab>Very well. I daresay it can't be worse than the horrors we've already seen.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002620_HANNISHMANB<tab>T'en fais pas. Plus rien peut nous effrayer maintenant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002630_VARSHAHN<tab>...Many thanks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002630_VARSHAHN<tab>Merci...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002640_HANNISHOLDWOMANB<tab>A dragon!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002640_HANNISHOLDWOMANB<tab>Regardez<var 1D /var>! Un dragon<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002650_HANNISHBOYB<tab>Wow!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002650_HANNISHBOYB<tab>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002660_VRITRA<tab>People of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han. I am Vrtra, and for years uncounted hath this isle served as mine abode.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002660_VRITRA<tab>Habitants de Radz-at-Han. Mon nom est Vrtra. Je suis un dragon qui vit sur cette île depuis des temps immémoriaux.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002670_VRITRA<tab>'Tis as the satrap's ally I am known. Today, I would reveal the truth unto you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002670_VRITRA<tab>Certains d'entre vous me connaissent déjà comme le fidèle ami du satrape, le dragon féal. Toutefois... la vérité ne s'arrête pas là.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002680_GRAHATIA<tab>Let us hope they accept him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002680_GRAHATIA<tab>Espérrrons qu'ils ne le rejettent pas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002690_HANNISHMANB<tab>If I am hearing this right, you were the satrap all along!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002690_HANNISHMANB<tab>Alors c'est vous qui régniez sur Thavnair depuis le début<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002700_HANNISHBOYB<tab>Varshahn─ I mean, Master Vrtra... D-Does your divine eye really see all?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002700_HANNISHBOYB<tab>Tu vois vraiment tout avec ton Œil pur, Varshahn<var 1D /var>? Pardon, je veux dire, Vrtra. Euh... Votre Excellence<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002710_VRITRA<tab>...Nay, child. While mine eye hath borne witness to the whole of our nation's history, to its future I am blind as thee.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002710_VRITRA<tab>Non... Je lis dans le passé de Radz-at-Han comme dans un livre ouvert, car je l'ai vécu. Mais son avenir, lui, continue de s'écrire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002720_VRITRA<tab>Countrymen. Calamity the likes of which we have never known is come to Thavnair. Our home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002720_VRITRA<tab>Un avenir qui est aujourd'hui menacé par une crise sans précédent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002730_VRITRA<tab>Friends and loved ones have been taken from us. I, too, have lost my closest confidant.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002730_VRITRA<tab>Vous avez tous perdu des êtres chers, irremplaçables, des gens à qui vous teniez plus qu'à la prunelle de vos yeux. Sachez que je partage votre douleur...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002740_VRITRA<tab>Ahewann loved this land, and served it with dignity till his dying breath. A nobler satrap there will never be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002740_VRITRA<tab>Ahewann était bien plus qu'un ami... Il était mon confident. Sa sincérité n'avait d'égal que son amour pour Radz-at-Han. Et que demander de plus à notre satrape<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002750_VRITRA<tab>For so long, I lacked the courage to face you. I will not easily earn your trust─this I know.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002750_VRITRA<tab>Comparé à lui, je sais qu'il me sera difficile de gagner votre confiance, surtout après vous avoir si longtemps caché mon existence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002760_VRITRA<tab>And yet, I cannot sit idly by and abandon Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han to her fate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002760_VRITRA<tab>Néanmoins... je m'attellerai à cette tâche avec autant d'ardeur que possible, car je ne souhaite pas voir notre fière cité tomber dans l'oubli.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002770_VRITRA<tab>A font of boundless vibrancy, this jewel of the ocean. Since time immemorial hath she glittered with every color imaginable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002770_VRITRA<tab>Pas quand vous, humains, avez ajouté à son faste génération après génération. Pas quand vous, humains, en avez fait une capitale cosmopolite à la croisée des peuples.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002780_VRITRA<tab>To this dragon slumbering in his dark lair, 'twas a mesmerizing sight─and one that brought no end of joy to my heart.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002780_VRITRA<tab>Pour moi, qui ai passé la majorité de mon existence à sommeiller seul dans un antre obscur, c'est un miracle qui ne manque jamais de m'émerveiller.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002790_VRITRA<tab>This calamity hath stolen too much from you already. Yet so long as you live, the light of Radz-at-Han will never be extinguished.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002790_VRITRA<tab>Le désastre qui nous frappe a assombri bien des vies, mais tant que ses habitants tiendront bon, Radz-at-Han retrouvera son éclat.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002800_VRITRA<tab>I pray you let me watch over it...over you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002800_VRITRA<tab>Si vous m'accordez votre bénédiction, je serai là pour vous protéger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002810_VRITRA<tab>And lend me your strength, that we might face this trial and those to come as one.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002810_VRITRA<tab>En échange, je vous demanderai humblement votre aide pour surmonter cette périlleuse épreuve.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002820_HANNISHOLDWOMANB<tab>I do not know you, dragon. But I thank you for speaking the truth to us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002820_HANNISHOLDWOMANB<tab>Je ne sais pas si je parle pour tout le monde, mais... je suis heureuse que vous nous ayez avoué la vérité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002830_HANNISHOLDWOMANB<tab>As divinities both Manusya and Mrga once joined together, so too do I believe that, hand in hand, we can overcome this ordeal, and welcome an era of peace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002830_HANNISHOLDWOMANB<tab>Et je pense que personne ici ne rejette votre proposition. C'est main dans la main que les Manusya et les Mrga ont autrefois œuvré pour la paix, la preuve qu'humains et animaux peuvent s'entendre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002840_ALPHINAUD<tab>...A sight that would have surely brought a smile to Ysayle's face.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002840_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ce spectacle aurait ravi Ysayle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002850_ESTINIEN<tab>...Indeed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002850_ESTINIEN<tab>Peut-être bien, oui.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002860_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Excuse me, but I must speak with the satrap at once.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002860_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Désolé de vous interrompre. Je souhaiterais m'adresser au satrape. Pourriez-vous m'indiquer où le trouver<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002870_ALISAIE<tab>Father!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002870_ALISAIE<tab>Père<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002880_FOURCHENAULT<tab>You have suffered dearly of late. Yet you must endeavor to look beyond these losses to the future you yet have.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002880_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Un terrible désastre s'est abattu sur votre cité, toutefois, tout espoir n'est pas encore perdu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002890_FOURCHENAULT<tab>On behalf of the Forum of Sharlayan, I come with a proposal by which you, the people of Radz-at-Han, might be saved.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002890_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Mon nom est Fourchenault Leveilleur. Je représente le Conseil de Sharlayan et suis venu vous proposer une issue.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002900_FOURCHENAULT<tab>I say again, I must speak with your satrap. I beseech you─take me to him with all possible haste.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002900_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Veuillez excuser ma hâte, mais la situation étant ce qu'elle est, nous devons parler à votre satrape le plus rapidement possible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002910_VRITRA<tab>I am satrap here. Speak thy proposal. All present shall hear and judge.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002910_VRITRA<tab>C'est désormais moi qui assume ce rôle. Je vous écoute, visiteurs de Sharlayan. Parlez.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002920_FOURCHENAULT<tab>If I have given offense, then I apologize. First, allow me to share with you what knowledge we have of the phenomenon responsible for your woes: the Final Days.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002920_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Pardonnez-moi, j'aurais dû le réaliser plus tôt... Un terrible mal frappe à vos portes, Satrape de Radz-at-Han.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002930_FOURCHENAULT<tab>'Tis an affliction of stagnancy and rot sown into the currents of the star. Though the first prominent manifestation was here in Thavnair, it will invariably spread to every corner of the world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002930_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Thavnair a joué de malchance et subit de plein fouet les premiers effets de “l'apocalypse”<var 1D /var>; un phénomène que nous avons nommé ainsi sans hyperbole, car il est destiné à consumer la planète tout entière.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002940_FOURCHENAULT<tab>The Forum was forewarned of this apocalypse several centuries ago.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002940_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Aussi incroyable que cela puisse paraître, son avènement a été révélé au Conseil de Sharlayan il y a des siècles de cela.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002950_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Thenceforth, my predecessors sought to prepare for the end times in the only conceivable fashion: by securing a means of escape.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002950_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Et depuis, nous n'avons eu de cesse de nous y préparer... Notre but est simple, assurer la survie de l'humanité, en évacuant cet astre pour lequel sonne le glas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002960_HANNISHMANB<tab>Escape the star? What madness is this!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002960_HANNISHMANB<tab>Évacuer Hydaelyn tout entière<var 1D /var>!? Vous n'êtes pas sérieux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002970_FOURCHENAULT<tab>'Tis by no means madness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002970_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Je le suis on ne peut plus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002980_FOURCHENAULT<tab>With the coming of the Seventh Umbral Calamity, the true nature of the red moon Dalamud was revealed─that it was an artificial construct of ancient Allag.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002980_FOURCHENAULT<tab>La plupart d'entre vous savent que Dalamud, la lune rouge qui provoqua le septième fléau, était un astre artificiel créé par les Allagois.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002990_FOURCHENAULT<tab>But what of the silver moon?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_002990_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Ce que vous ignorez, c'est que notre autre lune, la blanche, cache elle aussi un secret.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003000_FOURCHENAULT<tab>This celestial satellite is yet another technological marvel fashioned and maintained by ancient allies. A ship that will sail the heavens and deliver our people from destruction.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003000_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Il s'agit en réalité d'un gigantesque navire de sauvetage construit par nos ancêtres, un navire sur lequel nous traverserons l'océan étoilé et partirons en exode.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003010_FOURCHENAULT<tab>And by our people, I speak not only of Sharlayan. We mean to save every man, woman, and child it is within our power to save.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003010_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Sharlayan n'a aucunement l'intention de l'accaparer, notre but est de secourir autant de personnes que possible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003020_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Including you, our dear friends of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han. Recent events necessitate adjustments be made, and quickly, but we can and will escort you safely to the moon.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003020_FOURCHENAULT<tab>Outre l'amitié qui lie nos deux cités, l'urgence de votre situation exige que tout soit mis en œuvre pour vous permettre de trouver refuge sur la lune au plus tôt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003030_VRITRA<tab>Long has thy Forum been allies to Thavnair. I trust thou dost not extend this offer lightly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003030_VRITRA<tab>Aussi extravagantes vos révélations soient-elles, la longue histoire de nos relations suffit à me convaincre de leur véracité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003040_VRITRA<tab>Yet I wonder...is this truly the way? Is there a future to be built for us beyond this star our father deemed the last bastion of hope?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003040_VRITRA<tab>Je crains toutefois que vous ne soyez trop optimiste. Selon mon père, Hydaelyn était notre dernier espoir. Pensez-vous vraiment pouvoir en trouver un autre<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06003_003050_FOURCHENAULT<tab>It is for that very reason I come before you and your people. To answer any and all of your questions. To offer my assurances and allay your fears.
